description.zh: 适合放在较狭窄的区域内。
会动的进度条才是好进度条。
description.en: A dynamic progress bar is better.

description.zh: 会动的进度条才是好进度条。
description.en: A dynamic progress bar is better.
You can custom text format by setting `format`.

description.zh: 通过设置 `type=dashboard`，可以很方便地实现仪表盘样式的进度条。
description.en: By setting `type=dashboard`, you can get a dashboard style of progress easily.

node.html:
Progress 的属性说明如下：

参数 说明 类型
value 当前百分比值，同 percent,受控。 number
dataSet 数据源 DataSet
name 字段名 string

更多属性请参考 Progress。

pageContext.description:
Display the current progress of an operation flow.

When To Use

If it will take a long time to complete an operation, you can use Progress to show the current progress and status.

  • When an operation will interrupt the current interface, or it needs to run in the background for more than 2 seconds.
  • When you need to display the completion percentage of an operation.
